entry.title: Welcome to Operative Word
entry.content:
Welcome to to my site. I’m glad you found your way here.

Primarily, this will be an unapologetic resource for the things I’m interested in personally, professionally and generally.

Topics can range from IT development and transformation topics like software craftmanship, re-factoring and DevOps to the practice of martial arts or tips and tricks for film-making.

If you have a specific area of interest, you can filter my posts based on the tags and ignore all the things which are irrelevant to you.

I hope you encounter something useful to you here!
entry.summary: Welcome to to my site. I’m glad you found your way here.
